attributes.action: remove tax on fuel used for travelling to and from work where public transport is not available.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not always possible to live close to ones place of work and if this place of work is not accesible by public transport one has to pay a lot for fuel just to get to work. Many of these jobs are in the types of bussiness that keep the country running, oil refining, power generation, water treatment etc. Set up a system similar to that used by the self employed.
